TEXT.TITLE: IBM AUSTRALIA CREDIT ISSUES AUS DLR EUROBOND
TEXT.BODY: IBM Australia Credit Ltd is issuing a 75 mln Australian dlr eurobond due April 24, 1990 with a 14-1/8 pct coupon and priced at 101-1/4, Salomon Brothers International Ltd said as lead manager. The non-callable bonds will be issued in denominations of 1,000 and 10,000 dlrs and will be listed in Luxembourg. Gross fees of 1-1/2 pct comprise 1/2 pct for management and underwriting combined and one pct for selling. There will be co-leads. The borrower is wholly owned by International Business Machines Corp <IBM.N>. REUTER
